FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Horri-Bull - Ground Trooper

  1. Does moving a damage counter using Horri-Bull's ability count as damaging that character or repairing Horri-Bull? [Source: WotC]
    No. Moving damage counters never count as damaging or repairing a character.
